hero.heading: REDEFINE LIFESTYLE
hero.subtitle: Wujha Muscat is more than a home — it's a vibrant, integrated city in the heart of Knowledge Oasis Muscat. Live, work, and play in harmony, surrounded by nature, tranquility, and the people you love.

whyInvest.heading: Why Invest in Uptown Muscat?
whyInvest.lifestyleDescription: Uptown Muscat is more than a residence - it's a nature-inspired community that sparks creativity. With green spaces, open surroundings, and the lively Uptown Boulevard at its center, it balances work and life. Shops, a social club, playgrounds, and family areas all support convenience, connection, and memorable moments.
whyInvest.locationDescription: Located in Knowledge Oasis Muscat (KOM) - Oman's leading tech park managed by @madaynoman - Uptown sits at the center of the country's digital growth. KOM hosts 200+ companies, from local SMEs and education hubs to global brands, powered by a skilled, multilingual workforce. For residents and investors, it offers direct access to opportunity, innovation, and a thriving knowledge economy.

aboutUs.heading: Why WUJHA?
aboutUs.paragraph1: At Wujha, we aspire to go beyond the ordinary.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our vision is to transform urban spaces into sustainable, vibrant destinations that enrich lives and inspire communities. We are committed to building exceptional environments where luxury meets purpose – communities that elevate aspirations, foster harmony, and reflect the highest international standards.
aboutUs.paragraph3: Through thoughtfully designed residential spaces, business centers, and integrated developments, Wujha creates more than buildings; we create lifestyles shaped for a brighter future. At the heart of our culture lies a promise to deliver experiences that are not only luxurious but truly enriching – ensuring every project reflects the essence of Wujha's vision.

offerings.heading: Amenities That Elevate Living
offerings.subtitle: Discover a range of world-class amenities designed to enhance your lifestyle. From fitness and wellness to leisure and entertainment, Uptown Muscat has it all.

cinema.title: Cinema
cinema.subtitle: This small private cinema can be fully reserved and seats about 12 VIP guests, plus one large premium sofa.

pool.title: Pool
pool.subtitle: Pool access is on the lower floor beside other sports facilities, with locker rooms and restrooms connected by stairs and elevators.

gym.title: Gym
gym.subtitle: Two gyms are provided—one shared and one for women—each with its own locker room, sauna, and jacuzzi.

childcare.title: Childcare
childcare.subtitle: During working hours, children will be taken care of by trained caregivers.

firstaid.title: First Aid Room
firstaid.subtitle: Located within the sports facility, this area supports quick first aid and has ground-floor parking access for fast transfer to emergency care.

commercial.title: Commercial Area
commercial.subtitle: Mix of retail options on the longest boulevard in Muscat.
